text: Cathy Catherine Janet Cavadini (born April 21, 1961) is an American voice actress known for character Blossom in Powerpuff Girls franchise. ==Filmography== ===Animated Roles=== * Adventures From The Book of Virtues * Back From The Future The Animated * The Batman * Batman, The Brave And The Bold * Ben 10 * The Cleveland Show * Darkwing Duck * Doc McStuffins * Duck Dodgers * Duckman * Fievel's American Tails * Jackie Chan's Adventures * Jem * Johnny Bravo * Justice League, Justice League Unlimited * Kidd Video * Little Mermaid The Series * Mister T * My Life as a Teenage Robot * My Little Pony * Attack of the Nutri Ventures * Peter Pan and The Pirates * The Powerpuff Girls - Blossom (1995-2002, 2009-2014) * The New Adventures of Sheldon * Teen Titans * Spider-Man and His Amazing Friends * Superman * What-a-Cartoon - Blossom * What's with Andy * The Powerpuff Girls Movie * Powerpuff Girls in Twas The Fight Before Christmas Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors
title: Cathy Cavadini
